A heartwarming video of Paul Sorvino reacting to his daughter Mira Sorvinos Oscar win in 1996 is making the rounds on the internet, just one day after the Goodfellas actors death at 83. 
A fan tweet… [+1560 chars]

articles.author: Alex Gurley
articles.title: Audrina Patridge Spilled The Details On Her Relationship With Chris Pine And TBH, I Totally Forgot That They Dated - BuzzFeed
articles.description: "There weren’t enough hours in the day to do my job and find time to see him privately."
